at the cast-on edge find the foundation tail end and pull up tightly to 43sts gather the cast-on sts thread up the tail end into a yarn sewing needle row 24 decrease k1 p1 k2 skpo k2 p1 k3 3 times p1 k2 skpo k4 to end -
